LanguageData.Hediffs_MentalPowerLv1.label: Focused Seishin Lv.1
LanguageData.Hediffs_MentalPowerLv1.description: Tip 1: To obtain the permanent buff at Level 3 & 4 of Focused Seishin (Spirit/Heart/Mind/Soul) dietary restrictions are required.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MentalPowerLv2.label: Focused Seishin Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_MentalPowerLv2.description: Tip 2: Various-mostly physical-buffs can be acquired.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MentalPower.label: Focused Seishin
LanguageData.Hediffs_MentalPower.description: Thank you for letting me experience all the flavors of the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
